alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 13 at 3:27PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...The San Luis Valley, and Huerfano and western Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
